app.name: GoldWen
app.description: GoldWen revolutionizes online dating by offering an intentional and calming approach. No more endless swiping, make way for meaningful connections.

hero.title: A revolutionary approach to dating
hero.subtitle: No more endless swiping and anxiety. GoldWen offers a calming and intentional experience for authentic connections.

features.title: A revolutionary approach to dating
features.subtitle: No more endless swiping and anxiety. GoldWen offers a calming and intentional experience for authentic connections.

daily_selection.title: Daily Selection
daily_selection.description: Receive 3 to 5 carefully selected profiles every day at noon.

smart_matching.title: Smart Matching
smart_matching.description: Our algorithm prioritizes compatibility of values and personalities.

ephemeral_conversations.title: Ephemeral Conversations
ephemeral_conversations.description: Discussions limited to 24 hours to encourage authentic exchanges.

calm_design.title: Calming Design
calm_design.description: Minimalist interface inspired by "Calm Technology" to reduce anxiety.

calm_tech.title: The "Calm Technology" philosophy
calm_tech.description: GoldWen adopts the principles of "Calm Technology" to create a soothing experience that reduces anxiety related to traditional dating apps.
calm_tech.subtitle1: Our minimalist interface, generous spaces and predictable interactions allow you to focus on what matters: creating authentic connections.
calm_tech.subtitle2: With only one notification per day and time-limited conversations, we encourage more intentional and less compulsive exchanges.

minimal_design.title: Minimalist Design
minimal_design.description: Clean interfaces without superfluous elements for a serene experience.

predictable_interactions.title: Predictable Interactions
predictable_interactions.description: Each action is clear and reassuring, you always know what's happening.

limited_notifications.title: Limited Notifications
limited_notifications.description: One notification per day, no artificially created dependency.

personas.title: Who is GoldWen designed for?
personas.subtitle: Our app is for people who are looking for authentic connections and are tired of traditional dating apps.

sophie.name: Sophie, the Intentional
sophie.description: Urban professional, tired of superficiality. Looking for a serious relationship and values compatibility of values.

marc.name: Marc, the Ambitious Professional
marc.description: Demanding career, little free time. Optimizes his search by focusing on serious profiles.

download.title: Ready to experience a different kind of dating?
download.subtitle: Join GoldWen and discover how quality can transform your online dating. Download the app today.
download.coming_soon: Coming soon on iOS and Android

footer.description: The dating app that prioritizes the quality of connections for authentic and lasting relationships.
